title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 400.1 - Notification by the administrator
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 400.1 - Notification by the administrator

State Regulations

The administrator shall notify the Commissioner of

Transportation in writing whenever the fee is to be discontinued, reimposed, raised or lowered. The commissioner shall then notify all licensees of the
change. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
400.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
